mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_PET
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_PET (PET_CODE, MEM_CODE, PET_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_IMG, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_GENDER, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUT, PET_FORM, PET_CARE, PET_ALLERGY, PET_MAIN) VALUES (#{pet_code}, #{mem_code}, #{pet_type}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_img}, #{pet_breed}, #{pet_birth}, #{pet_gender}, #{pet_weight}, #{pet_neut}, #{pet_form}, #{pet_care}, #{pet_allergy}, #{pet_main})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_PET P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE WHERE M.MEM_CODE=#{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_PET SET PET_NAME = #{pet_name}, PET_IMG = #{pet_img}, PET_GENDER = #{pet_gender}, PET_WEIGHT = #{pet_weight}, PET_NEUT = #{pet_neut}, PET_FORM = #{pet_form}, PET_CARE = #{pet_care}, PET_ALLERGY = #{pet_allergy} WHERE PET_CODE=#{pet_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COUPON WHERE (SYSDATE BETWEEN CP_START AND CP_END) AND (CP_KEYWORD IS NULL)

SELECT CP.CP_NO,MC_CODE,CP_NAME,CP_KEYWORD,CP_START,CP_END,CP_DEAD,CP_TYPE,CP_AMOUNT FROM COUPON CP JOIN MEMBER_COUPON_BRIDGE MC ON CP.CP_NO=MC.CP_NO WHERE MEM_CODE=#{param1} AND MC_USE IS NULL AND MC_DEAD IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS SET ADDR_DEFAULT = 'N' WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode} AND ADDR_DEFAULT = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (ADDR_CODE, MEM_CODE, ADDR_POSTAL, ADDR_LINE1, ADDR_LINE2, ADDR_DEFAULT) VALUES (#{addrCode}, #{memCode}, #{addrPostal}, #{addrLine1}, #{addrLine2}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_PRICE, P.PRO_DISCOUNT, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, PO.PROOPT_STOCK, MC.CART_CODE, MC.O_CODE FROM PRODUCT_CART MC LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON MC.PRO_CODE = PI.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON MC.PRO_CODE = P.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON MC.PROOPT_CODE = PO.PROOPT_CODE WHERE MC.MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} AND P.PRO_ONOFF = '판매' AND MC.O_CODE IS NULL GROUP BY MC.CART_REGDATE, PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_PRICE, P.PRO_DISCOUNT, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, PO.PROOPT_STOCK, MC.CART_CODE, MC.O_CODE ORDER BY MC.CART_REGDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_CART WHERE MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} AND O_CODE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_PRICE, P.PRO_DISCOUNT, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, PO.PROOPT_STOCK, MC.CART_CODE FROM PRODUCT_CART MC LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON MC.PRO_CODE = PI.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON MC.PRO_CODE = P.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON MC.PROOPT_CODE = PO.PROOPT_CODE WHERE MC.CART_CODE = #{cartCode} GROUP BY MC.CART_REGDATE, PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_PRICE, P.PRO_DISCOUNT, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, PO.PROOPT_STOCK, MC.CART_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" VALUES (#{o_code}, #{mem_code}, #{o_addr}, #{o_resiver}, #{o_resiver_tell}, #{o_entry}, #{o_entry_detail}, #{o_memo}, #{mc_code}, #{o_coupon}, #{o_point}, #{o_payment}, #{o_amount}, #{o_saving}, SYSDATE + INTERVAL '3' DAY, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, MC.O_CODE FROM PRODUCT_CART MC LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON MC.PRO_CODE = PI.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON MC.PRO_CODE = P.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON MC.PROOPT_CODE = PO.PROOPT_CODE WHERE MC.O_CODE = #{o_code} GROUP BY PI.MAIN_IMG1, P.PRO_NAME, PO.PROOPT_NAME, PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE, MC.CART_CNT, MC.O_CODE

SELECT P.PRO_CODE, P.PRO_NAME, MIN(PO.PROOPT_FINALPRICE) AS MIN_PRICE, COALESCE(AVG(PR.REVIEW_RATING), 0) AS REVIEW_AVG, COUNT(PR.REVIEW_CODE) AS REVIEW_COUNT, PI.MAIN_IMG1 FROM MEMBER_WISHLIST W JOIN PRODUCT P ON W.PRO_CODE = P.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PRO_CODE = PO.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON P.PRO_CODE = PI.PRO_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_REVIEW PR ON P.PRO_CODE = PR.PRO_CODE WHERE W.MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} GROUP BY P.PRO_CODE, P.PRO_NAME, PI.MAIN_IMG1, W.WISHDATE
ORDER BY W.WISHDATE DESC ORDER BY MIN_PRICE ASC ORDER BY MIN_PRICE DESC ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC ORDER BY REVIEW_AVG DESC
SELECT HPHM.*, MEM.MEM_NICK FROM HELP_PETHOTEL_MEM HPHM, MEMBER MEM WHERE HPHM.MEM_CODE = MEM.MEM_CODE AND HPHM.MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} ORDER BY HPH_RGE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM HELP_PETHOTEL_MEM WHERE HPH_RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo}
SELECT * FROM HELP_PETHOTEL_PETS WHERE HPH_RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo}
